class.name: Vector3Array
class.description: An Array specifically designed to hold Vector3.

method.name: Vector3Array
method.description: Construct a new Vector3Array. Optionally, you can pass in an Array that will be converted.

method.name: push_back
method.description: Insert a Vector3 at the end.

method.name: resize
method.description: Set the size of the Vector3Array. If larger than the current size it will reserve some space beforehand, and if it is smaller it will cut off the array.

method.name: set
method.description: Change the [Vector3] at the given index.

method.name: size
method.description: Return the size of the array.
